name: Midnight Eden
description:
Welcome to Eden

After surviving a firefight through an intense car chase to escape from the local police force, you make it to the Resistance base. It dwells in Sector Alpha, the very heart of the first city on Earth's moon, Eden.

Wronged by the corporations who exploited you and your family, you seek retribution for those who have lost their dignity and livelihoods to the greed of the wealthy. 

Meet your new allies in the Resistance and learn about this new plan they've been concocting to deal with the corrupt police in Sector Alpha and the newly appointed captain that's been dealing massive blows to the Resistance.

Help take back the city for the people!

Controls

WASD/Arrow keys: Move Around

J: Quest Log

Spacebar: Interact with objects/Talk to NPCs

Mouseclick: Select dialogue or UI options

What is Midnight Eden?

This is an immersive city I created in the Unity Engine. It allows you to control a character in a third-person perspective and interact with people and objects in a sci-fi setting that I had arranged using free pre-made assets. This experience allows the players to traverse two areas: The Resistance base and the city of Eden itself. Roam around and talk to people to learn who they are, receive hints, and learn about what else is going on in the area. You will find out about their troubles and choose to assist. There are plenty of dialogue options to choose from, so character reactions can be different each time. Your actions may even have consequences. 

This game was created as a portfolio piece to showcase my skills in Unity and the Dialogue System by Pixel Crushers. 

Here I demonstrate a blend of skills including:

  • Narrative Design
  • Environmental Storytelling
  • Dialogue Branching
  • Timeline/Animations
  • Cinematography
  • Quests
